review: I was very excited to receive the Chromecast enabling me to watch Netflix and a few other channels on my upstairs TV.  Sadly, it's still not connected due to the fact my popular router (Motorola Surfboard) which is a primary router provided by Comcast is not on their list of approved routers.  It is not plug/play and I haven't gone back to work through all the details to potentially get it operational I was very disappointed this was not highlighted in the information more.  I gave it 3 stars due to the fact several friends have had no issue with connection as well as a friend I sent one too.
author: Bourbon Girl

review: Does everything advertised.  Anything you can bring up in your chrome browser can be cast to your TV with just a click.  No need to pay those high cable/sat bills anymore.

review: Love it, I have an extra TV I didn't really use oftenonly to play video games,  but since I got the Chromecast I leave my big TV on the cable and use the smaller one to watch Netflix,  VUDU, Start, HBO and a lot more it's great, should've bought a long time ago.
